original_text: Saul replied, ‘You could not fight against this strong Philistine. You are only a boy! He has been a brave soldier since he was a young man.’
korean_text: 사울이 다윗에게 이르되 네가 가서 저 블레셋 사람과 싸울 수 없으리니 너는 소년이요 그는 어려서부터 용사임이니라

sentences.original_text: You could not fight against this strong Philistine
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 강한 블레셋 사람과 싸울 수 없다

sentences.original_text: He has been a brave soldier
since he was a young man
